title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
SR:
Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2, GTK2, KDE 2.2.10 (GTK2 only):

1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around.
3. However, the scrollbars do not have any effect.
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any action.
